page.title: 13JEWSONS
page.content:
{Jewsons}is{situated}on{Earith High {Street.}Jewsons has been in{business} for over 100 years.It originated in{ {Earith}because the man and his family who started it,lived in Earith.It is now a large company which sells bricks and wood.It has a shop which sells building tools and a show-room which puts bathrooms and kitchens on display.Jewsons used to transport their materials by horse and cart or it was transported by barge on the {River Ouse}behind.They have four lorries and four lorry drivers.Also there is a fork lift and two side lifts. Jewsons is now a{nationwide } company with{154 branches.}In{ {Cambridgeshire}there are{3 branches.}
(By Lyndsey and Meredith aged 10)
